sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
He calls for justice for [[House Karstark]] when [[Jaime Lannister]] is recaptured having killed [[Torrhen Karstark]] during an escape attempt.<ref>"[[A Man Without Honor]]"</ref>
